Methods : From January 1993 March 1998 , 268 patient randomize either adjuvant chemotherapy ( 135 pt ) surgery alone ( 133 pt ) . The primary endpoint overall survival . Relapse-free survival site recurrence secondary endpoint . Comparison : gastrectomy D2 great lymph node dissection versus gastrectomy adjuvant chemotherapy curative resection serosa-positive gastric cancer patient .
